TestCase.name: testUnionToDistinctRule
TestCase.Resource: select * from dept union select * from dept
AggregateRel(groupCount=[2]) UnionRel(all=[true]) ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]]) ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])
UnionRel(all=[false]) ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]]) ProjectRel(DEPTNO=[$0], NAME=[$1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testExtractJoinFilterRule
TestCase.Resource: select 1 from emp inner join dept on emp.deptno=dept.deptno
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) JoinRel(condition=[=($7, $9)], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) FilterRel(condition=[=($7, $9)]) JoinRel(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testAddRedundantSemiJoinRule
TestCase.Resource: select 1 from emp inner join dept on emp.deptno = dept.deptno
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) JoinRel(condition=[=($7, $9)], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) JoinRel(condition=[=($7, $9)], joinType=[inner], semiJoinDone=[true], multiJoinDone=[false]) SemiJoinRel(condition=[=($7, $9)], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testPushFilterThroughOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: select 1 from sales.dept d left outer join sales.emp e on d.deptno = e.deptno where d.name = 'Charlie'
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) FilterRel(condition=[=($1, _ISO-8859-1'Charlie')]) JoinRel(condition=[=($0, $9)], joinType=[left]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]])
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[1]) JoinRel(condition=[=($0, $9)], joinType=[left]) FilterRel(condition=[=($1, _ISO-8859-1'Charlie')]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testReduceAverage
TestCase.Resource: select name, max(name), avg(deptno), min(name) from sales.dept group by name

ProjectRel(NAME=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], EXPR$2=[$2], EXPR$3=[$3]) AggregateRel(groupCount=[1], agg#0=[MAX(0)], agg#1=[AVG(1)], agg#2=[MIN(0)]) ProjectRel($f0=[$1], $f1=[$0]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])

ProjectRel(NAME=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], EXPR$2=[$2], EXPR$3=[$3]) ProjectRel($f0=[$0], $f1=[$1], $f2=[CAST(/($2, $4)):INTEGER], $f3=[$3]) AggregateRel(groupCount=[1], agg#0=[MAX(0)], agg#1=[SUM(1)], agg#2=[MIN(0)], agg#3=[COUNT(1)]) ProjectRel($f0=[$1], $f1=[$0]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, DEPT]])

TestCase.name: testPushProjectPastFilter
TestCase.Resource: select empno + deptno from emp where sal = 10 * comm and upper(ename) = 'FOO'
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($0, $7)]) FilterRel(condition=[AND(=($5, *(10, $6)), =(UPPER($1), _ISO-8859-1'FOO'))]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]])

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($0, $4)]) FilterRel(condition=[AND(=($2, *(10, $3)), =(UPPER($1), _ISO-8859-1'FOO'))]) ProjectRel(EMPNO=[$0], ENAME=[$1], SAL=[$5], COMM=[$6], DEPTNO=[$7]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testPushProjectPastJoin
TestCase.Resource: select e.sal + b.comm from emp e inner join bonus b on e.ename = b.ename and e.deptno = 10
ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($5, $12)]) JoinRel(condition=[AND(=($1, $9), =($7, 10))], joinType=[inner]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, BONUS]])

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($1, $4)]) JoinRel(condition=[AND(=($0, $3), =($2, 10))], joinType=[inner]) ProjectRel(ENAME=[$1], SAL=[$5], DEPTNO=[$7]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]]) ProjectRel(ENAME=[$0], COMM=[$3]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, BONUS]])
